forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few clouds. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with morning showers evolving to a steady, soaking rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later at night. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
